data.title: Cody Linley Movies and Shows
data.meta_description: Learn about Cody Linley on Apple TV. Browse shows and movies that feature Cody Linley including Hoovey, Hoot, and more.
data.text:
New Kid in School

When "Jake Ryan," a famous TV actor, enrolls in Miley's school and reaps the benefits of all the preferential treatment, Miley reconsiders whether or not to keep her secret as Hannah Montana. Jackson borrows Robby's car and accidentally puts a scratch on it, unaware that Robby has accidentally done more damage than that to Jackson's own vehicle.

More Than a Zombie to Me

When Jake asks Miley to the school dance she says no but after guest starring on his TV show as Hannah Montana, she has a change of heart. Unfortunately, so did Jake as he's now committed to taking Lilly instead. Jackson wages a prank war on Robby unaware that Robby has a few tricks up his sleeve that he uses to teach his son a lesson.

Good Golly, Miss Dolly

Dolly accidentally records Miley expressing her feelings for Jake Ryan. The tape gets confused with another tape and Dolly, Miley, and her friends must race to get it back before Jake Ryan sees it. Also, Robby and Jackson try to stay manly despite all the girly things Dolly introduces to their home during her stay.

Achy Jakey Heart (Part 1 of 2)

When Jake Ryan wins Miley's affection back, he tells her his real name so they don't have any secrets between them. Feeling guilty about hiding her identity, Miley reveals that she is Hannah Montana.

Achy Jakey Heart (Part 2 of 2)

Aware of Miley's secret, Jake disguises himself as a normal guy in order to avoid star-struck fans. But "normal" Jake is impatient and obnoxious, so Miley tries to get him to break up with her and hopes that he will keep her secret.
